plot outline: A girl is kidnapped and brought to a hamlet in Tamil Nadu. She falls in love with the younger son of the kidnapper. Flashbacks reveal family feuds and ego clashes between the older generations. Can the younger couple find a happily ever after?
title: Preethiyalli Sahaja
plot: A woman who gets kidnapped to a hamlet in Tamil Nadu falls in love with the younger son of the kidnapper.

A girl is kidnapped and brought to a hamlet in Tamil Nadu. She falls in love with the younger son of the kidnapper. Flashbacks reveal family feuds and ego clashes between the older generations. Can the younger couple find a happily ever after?
